  <!-- Performance API Polyfills -->
  <script>
  (function () {
    var noop = function noop() {};
    if ("performance" in window === false) {
      window.performance = {};
    }
    window.performance.mark = performance.mark || noop;
    window.performance.measure = performance.measure || noop;
    if ("now" in window.performance === false) {
      var nowOffset = Date.now();
      if (performance.timing && performance.timing.navigationStart) {
        nowOffset = performance.timing.navigationStart;
      }
      window.performance.now = function now() {
        return Date.now() - nowOffset;
      };
    }
  })();
  </script>

<script id="wix-first-paint">
    if (window.ResizeObserver &&
        (!window.PerformanceObserver || !PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes || PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes.indexOf('paint') === -1)) {
        new ResizeObserver(function (entries, observer) {
            entries.some(function (entry) {
                var contentRect = entry.contentRect;
                if (contentRect.width > 0 && contentRect.height > 0) {
                    requestAnimationFrame(function (now) {
                        window.wixFirstPaint = now;
                        dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('wixFirstPaint'));
                    });
                    observer.disconnect();
                    return true;
                }
            });
        }).observe(document.body);
    }
</script>

alt="GrungeBackround_UI2.png" style="width: 952px; height: 476px; object-fit: cover; object-position: 50% 50%;" width="952" height="476"></wow-image></div></div><div id="comp-lb2jhc1u4" class="KcpHeO tz5f0K comp-lb2jhc1u4 wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Survival Nation is an open-world online RPG VR game</span>. The player takes on the role of one of the <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">zombie apocalypse</span> survivors. The main goal is to survive, but to do so, he has to <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">cooperate </span>with other members of the survival camp.<br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
In this game, you will:</span></span><br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
&nbsp;</p>

<ul class="font_8 color_11 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;">
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">kill hundreds of zombies,</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">acquire weapons,</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">learn new skills,</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">craft,</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">explore the world,</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">complete quests,</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">and most importantly, fight for survival.</span></span></p>
</li>
</ul>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></p></div><div id="comp-lb2jhc1c" class="v__F4U comp-lb2jhc1c wixui-image"><div data-testid="linkElement" class="MVY5Lo"><wow-image id="img_comp-lb2jhc1c" class="HlRz5e NM_OGj" data-image-info="{&quot;containerId&quot;:&quot;comp-lb2jhc1c&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;,&quot;targetWidth&quot;:830,&quot;targetHeight&quot;:464,&quot;isLQIP&quot;:true,&quot;imageData&quot;:{&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080,&quot;uri&quot;:&quot;5b0eac_0e261c3744ce4c608511d8789788d566~mv2.jpg&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Fishing_StovingOnFire.jpg&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;}}" data-bg-effect-name="" data-has-ssr-src="" data-src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_0e261c3744ce4c608511d8789788d566~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_1039,h_581,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/Fishing_StovingOnFire.jpg"><img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_0e261c3744ce4c608511d8789788d566~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_148,h_84,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_auto/Fishing_StovingOnFire.jpg" alt="Fishing_StovingOnFire.jpg" style="width: 831px; text-align:justify;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">To survive, you need to remember about <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">food and water</span>. You can get <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">food </span>in many ways: by <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">fishing, hunting, gathering, or scouring abandoned houses</span>. In a world where danger awaits you at every turn, taking care of sufficient needs is not the easiest thing to do.</span></span></p></div><div id="comp-lb4xlmno" class="KcpHeO tz5f0K comp-lb4xlmno wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">There is many ways to fill your backpacks with various resources that will help on your journay and exploration. Some resources will replenish health, quench your thirst or give you strength for further exploration. Don't forget to light a campfire ;)&nbsp;</span></span></p></div><div id="comp-lb4xuhr5" class="v__F4U comp-lb4xuhr5 wixui-image"><div data-testid="linkElement" class="MVY5Lo"><wow-image id="img_comp-lb4xuhr5" class="HlRz5e NM_OGj" data-image-info="{&quot;containerId&quot;:&quot;comp-lb4xuhr5&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;,&quot;targetWidth&quot;:830,&quot;targetHeight&quot;:464,&quot;isLQIP&quot;:true,&quot;imageData&quot;:{&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080,&quot;uri&quot;:&quot;5b0eac_db5e3b665a124c48a1f2e656f705b21b~mv2.jpg&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Hunting.jpg&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;}}" data-bg-effect-name="" data-has-ssr-src="" data-src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_db5e3b665a124c48a1f2e656f705b21b~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_1039,h_581,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/Hunting.jpg"><img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_db5e3b665a124c48a1f2e656f705b21b~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_148,h_84,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_auto/Hunting.jpg" alt="Hunting.jpg" style="width: 831px; height: 488px; object-fit: cover; object-position: 50% 50%;" width="976" height="488"></wow-image></div></div><div id="comp-lb3u7qim" class="KcpHeO tz5f0K comp-lb3u7qim wixui-rich-text" data-testid="richTextElement"><p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">They say that <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">cooperation is the key</span>. It is no different here. Survival Nation is a game that focuses on <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">multiplayer mode</span>. You can join other players and participate in a joint <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">adventure and exploration </span>of the world. <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Talk </span>to other people, <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">exchange items </span>and supplies, and <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">cooperate </span>during combat. If you don't want to cooperate join&nbsp;<span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">the PVP game mode</span>&nbsp;that offers an immersive experience, combining survival elements with total freedom of choice. It’s up to you whether you decide to cooperate with other players or hunt them down to get their loot. Don't worry. If you still don't want to play with other players, you can enjoy <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">Solo mode</span> and have fun playing alone.</span></span></p></div><div id="comp-lb3u9ml9" class="v__F4U comp-lb3u9ml9 wixui-image"><div data-testid="linkElement" class="MVY5Lo"><wow-image id="img_comp-lb3u9ml9" class="HlRz5e NM_OGj" data-image-info="{&quot;containerId&quot;:&quot;comp-lb3u9ml9&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;,&quot;targetWidth&quot;:830,&quot;targetHeight&quot;:464,&quot;isLQIP&quot;:true,&quot;imageData&quot;:{&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080,&quot;uri&quot;:&quot;5b0eac_ce796863a3ae4f41a6327b3d060b48e6~mv2.jpg&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;sn1.1920x1080.jpg&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;}}" data-bg-effect-name="" data-has-ssr-src="" data-src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_ce796863a3ae4f41a6327b3d060b48e6~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_1039,h_581,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/sn1_1920x1080.jpg"><img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_ce796863a3ae4f41a6327b3d060b48e6~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_148,h_84,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_auto/sn1_1920x1080.jpg" alt="sn1.1920x1080.jpg" style="width: 831px; A whole bunch of <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">missions and side</span> activities<br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
are waiting for you. All this to take care of the progression of your character. You have at your disposal<br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">&nbsp;unique skill trees</span>, which you develop with each level you gain. It's up to you whether you want to focus on survival skills, combat, physical endurance, or a mix of all of them. In addition to the skill trees, there are <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">quite a few weapons</span> waiting for you to acquire, which you can <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">upgrade</span>.</span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></span></span></span></p></div><div id="comp-lb2jhc1r2" class="v__F4U comp-lb2jhc1r2 wixui-image"><div data-testid="linkElement" class="MVY5Lo"><wow-image id="img_comp-lb2jhc1r2" class="HlRz5e NM_OGj" data-image-info="{&quot;containerId&quot;:&quot;comp-lb2jhc1r2&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;,&quot;targetWidth&quot;:830,&quot;targetHeight&quot;:464,&quot;isLQIP&quot;:true,&quot;imageData&quot;:{&quot;width&quot;:1920,&quot;height&quot;:1080,&quot;uri&quot;:&quot;5b0eac_b5f6ed52b48a4358afe6bb0bdef2b204~mv2.jpg&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;SN2.1920x1080.jpg&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;}}" data-bg-effect-name="" data-has-ssr-src="" data-src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_b5f6ed52b48a4358afe6bb0bdef2b204~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_1039,h_581,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/SN2_1920x1080.jpg"><img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5b0eac_b5f6ed52b48a4358afe6bb0bdef2b204~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_148,h_84,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_auto/SN2_1920x1080.jpg" alt="SN2.1920x1080.jpg" style="width: 831px; <p class="font_7 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">You'd probably like to know what you can do in this game. In addition to quests and many forms of food gathering mentioned earlier, there are</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"> many other activities</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">. You can search for items with a </span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">metal detector</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">climb </span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">on top of various spots, </span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span treasure</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span <br class="wixui-rich-text__text">
<span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">Survival Nation offers a mass of <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">diverse weaponry </span>at your disposal. Each weapon has not only different statistics but also a feeling, and a way of reloading. You can choose from a variety of weapons from categories such as <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">pistol, shotgun, rifle, melee,</span> and <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">explosives</span>. In addition, for real hunters, there is also a <span style="font-weight:bold;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">bow</span></span></span></span></span><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210ea8ce2c8,wf_c60fb4a1c4b444469dfa4210e,orig_bai_jamjuree_light;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:400;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="color_11 wixui-rich-text__text">!</span></span></span></span></span></p></div><div id="comp-lb46vpcw" class="v__F4U comp-lb46vpcw wixui-image" title="weapons_compressed.gif"><div data-testid="linkElement" class="MVY5Lo"><wow-image id="img_comp-lb46vpcw" class="HlRz5e NM_OGj" data-image-info="{&quot;containerId&quot;:&quot;comp-lb46vpcw&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;,&quot;targetWidth&quot;:901,&quot;targetHeight&quot;:505,&quot;isLQIP&quot;:false,&quot;imageData&quot;:{&quot;width&quot;:600,&quot;height&quot;:338,&quot;uri&quot;:&quot;957014_42985e62f6d446eb946d131d2320c120~mv2.gif&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;displayMode&quot;:&quot;fill&quot;}}" data-bg-effect-name="" data-has-ssr-src="" style="--wix-img-max-width:max(600px, 100%)" data-src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/957014_42985e62f6d446eb946d131d2320c120~mv2.gif"><img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/957014_42985e62f6d446eb946d131d2320c120~mv2.gif" alt="" style="width: 902px; <p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px; line-height:normal; text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

&nbsp;</p>

<p class="font_8 wixui-rich-text__text" style="font-size:18px; line-height:normal;"><span style="font-size:18px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:#F7F7F7;" class="wixui-rich-text__text">for questions about title contact:&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

<span style="font-size:25px;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-family:wfont_957014_867530e5996f4ad0bf379502b6066559,wf_867530e5996f4ad0bf379502b,orig_bai_jamjuree_regular;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-weight:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="font-style:normal;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="color:rgb(0, 0, 0);" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span style="letter-spacing:0em;" class="wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="inherit-font-size wixui-rich-text__text"><span class="wixGuard wixui-rich-text__text">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
